channel.title: My donator cape
channel.description:
Okay i just finished my donator outfit. It inclued a cape and hood :P
Heres a picture: [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2mydagi.jpg[/img]
Hope you like it! We do. Anyways we got a lil prob with it coz we cant make dat files for the cape and cape drop. (we already made dat files of the hood) Soo could sum1 with datmaker make those cape models into a dat file please?? so we can release em! Also we need ints for em all. So sum1 good with ints?? well please make ints for those 4 items! Drop and wear models.
Heres a link to the cape wear model, and hood models, the cape drop model is on the other link.
http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=9e202ad06e984dc2c2b435915e8821d77f8e0a2f64f4e5f0515d15c8b368bfbe
http://www.mediafire.com/?djyi42qzn3w
Thanks, Owner Blade

it isnt done but it looks kinda…not horrible…

item.title: My donator cape
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“jjones10, post:16, topic:302444”]i donno man. Recolors are not a good thing. ACF, you used to be big on that topic[/quote]True that, but from the experiences that I had with telling people that they don’t need to recolor but that they can make awesome models by themselves, I’ve seen that it doesn’t help allot.
Only 27,5% of the people that we tell actually does so.
They’d better start off with some recoloring and getting more advanced by modifying them , later on they can start with scratch modeling when they have enough experience on their own to come up with nice primitive models and/or Image remade models.

Just my opinion on it atm.

Read full topic

item.title: My donator cape
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:13, topic:302444”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=398769.msg2959876#msg2959876 date=1253110612]

[quote author=Assassins Creed Fan link=topic=398769.msg2959824#msg2959824 date=1253103561]

[quote author=WoodcutGuy link=topic=398769.msg2959542#msg2959542 date=1253067236]
Isn’t a donator cape pretty common now?
[/quote]2 Things WCG, He’s Dutch and He’s Trying.
That’s not very common here.
Not to get an attitude, but i’m like the only Dutch dude here with: Fans / Brains / Common Sense , and ofcourse Reputation.
[/quote]Just because he’s dutch doesn’t give him the rights to post crap, and I believe I’ve already seen this cape a few times, just without the hood?
[/quote]It might be ‘crap’ in your eyes but in mine it is seen as a nice and fresh start.
I myself began modelling skillcape’s as first models, and allot of moparscapians gave me good advice and teached me new and exciting things.
Why would you discourage someone by calling his model ‘crap’ if you could give Good criticism which would help him to advance in the modelling itself?
This kid might grow as big as me, and maybe even bigger.
Give him the time and opportunity and he will be alright.[/quote]I can still call it crap, saying it’s the best model ever or whatever you want me to do will NOT help him.

Read full topic

item.title: My donator cape
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

awww ACF what can I say but this is a recolor you used to flame over it? all cause its some one that dutch you change? you treat everyone the same only way someone can learn is by telling it to there face…but I know I will get flammed if I do so…

hmm colors are ok I guess maybe make a shield? do the same as you did with the dollar sign just make it 3d I am sure there is a tut floating around here somewhere that tells you how. maybe make a sword to and have the dollar sign as the hilt?O.o? idea? ok have fun good luck maybe you will end up like ACFwe can hope not:P

Read full topic

item.title: My donator cape
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:10, topic:302444”][quote author=Assassins Creed Fan link=topic=398769.msg2959824#msg2959824 date=1253103561]

[quote author=WoodcutGuy link=topic=398769.msg2959542#msg2959542 date=1253067236]
Isn’t a donator cape pretty common now?
[/quote]2 Things WCG, He’s Dutch and He’s Trying.
That’s not very common here.
Not to get an attitude, but i’m like the only Dutch dude here with: Fans / Brains / Common Sense , and ofcourse Reputation.
[/quote]Just because he’s dutch doesn’t give him the rights to post crap, and I believe I’ve already seen this cape a few times, just without the hood?[/quote]It might be ‘crap’ in your eyes but in mine it is seen as a nice and fresh start.
I myself began modelling skillcape’s as first models, and allot of moparscapians gave me good advice and teached me new and exciting things.
Why would you discourage someone by calling his model ‘crap’ if you could give Good criticism which would help him to advance in the modelling itself?
This kid might grow as big as me, and maybe even bigger.
Give him the time and opportunity and he will be alright.

Read full topic
